Guard Hector:
Be quiet! I am not allowed to talk while I'm on duty! Futhermore, the captain is standing right next to me... Hmmph, ok well. I'll tell you briefly. here, the town of Oren is close to the boarders, so we must never let our guard down.
Nevertheless, we have been told unoffically to always watch a certain tower. That is the Ivory Tower of course.
Ask about the Ivory Tower.
